user_prompt: Create Banking Website using Azure Infrastructure and provide proper security layers throughout the application

epics.title: Provision Secure Azure Infrastructure for Banking Website
epics.summary: Set up a compliant, scalable, and secure Azure environment for hosting the banking platform.
epics.description: This EPIC involves creating the foundational cloud environment on Azure to support the banking website. Tasks include establishing Resource Groups, Virtual Networks, Subnets, and Network Security Groups. Configure Application Gateways, Azure Key Vault for secret and encryption management, and implement Azure Policy for compliance enforcement. The design must prioritize high availability, security isolation between environments, and alignment with financial regulatory standards.

epics.title: Develop Core Banking Application Components
epics.summary: Implement main banking modules, including user accounts, authentication, and transactions.
epics.description: This EPIC focuses on developing user-facing features such as account creation, login, authentication, dashboard, transaction history, and fund transfers. The application must use strong secure coding practices, integrate identity management using Azure AD B2C, and enforce session controls. APIs and databases should be protected through Azure Private Link and encrypted communications, ensuring confidentiality and integrity of sensitive data.

epics.title: Implement Comprehensive Security Architecture
epics.summary: Apply multi-layered security controls to protect infrastructure, application, and data.
epics.description: This EPIC focuses on integrating Azure-native security mechanisms across all components. Key deliverables include deployment of Azure Firewall, Web Application Firewall (WAF), and DDoS Protection, along with endpoint hardening and RBAC implementation. Data encryption at rest and in transit must be enforced through Azure-managed keys. Security Center should be configured to monitor threats and compliance adherence to standards like PCI-DSS, SOC 2, and ISO 27001.

epics.title: Set Up Secure CI/CD Pipelines Using Azure DevOps
epics.summary: Automate integration and deployment with built-in code quality and security controls.
epics.description: This EPIC involves establishing continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines using Azure DevOps. It includes implementing static code analysis, dependency checks, vulnerability scanning, automated unit testing, and approvals for production releases. The pipelines should deploy via Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using ARM or Bicep templates and maintain immutable deployment histories for auditability and rollback capability.

epics.title: Configure Monitoring, Logging, and Threat Detection Systems
epics.summary: Implement observability and security incident management solutions.
epics.description: This EPIC focuses on deploying monitoring and auditing tools to track performance, reliability, and security posture. Configure Azure Monitor, Application Insights, and Log Analytics for telemetry collection and visualization. Enable Microsoft Defender for Cloud to detect potential intrusions and automate threat responses. Implement alerting rules, security baselines, and audit policies to ensure continuous visibility of all activities within the infrastructure and application layers.

epics.title: Design for Scalability, Resilience, and Disaster Recovery
epics.summary: Optimize the platform for high availability, redundancy, and business continuity.
epics.description: This EPIC covers the setup of scalable and resilient architecture components using Azure Front Door for traffic distribution, auto-scaling configurations for App Services, and caching via Redis. Configure database replication and geo-redundant storage to support disaster recovery scenarios. Define a recovery time objective (RTO) and recovery point objective (RPO) aligned with banking SLAs, and conduct failover tests to validate business continuity readiness.
